page.title: 13Churchgate St The "Zoo"
page.content:
In the grounds of the{Queen's Head}Inn is a{menagerie}of 189 unusual domestic animals.
These include 8 goats, 10 highland cattle, 23 sheep, 12 pheasants of different breeds and a collection of ducks, geese, chickens, turkeys, peacocks, rabbits, cats and dogs.
Of particular interest is the collection of different breeds of{ {bantam cocks and hens.}
They do not belong to the publican, but to one of his customers. They are cared for by a pensioner who used to work in the Rural Sciences department at{Netteswell Comprehensive School.
